document.full_text: the italian luxury goods maker is said to have received approval to go public as it seeks to sell a one-fifth stake in itself for about 1.8 billion euros.
document.title: prada is cleared for hong kong i.p.o.
lines_and_colors: the italian luxury goods maker is said to have received approval to go public as it seeks to sell a one-fifth stake in itself for about 1.8 billion euros.
